name: searchForFourthResult
description:
- Open Mozilla Firefox
- Navigate to [https://www.google.com/]
- Search for [TestNG]
- Assert that the text of the fourth result is [TestNG Tutorial]
- Close Mozilla Firefox
descriptionHtml:
• Open Mozilla Firefox
  • Navigate to [https://www.google.com/]

  • Close Mozilla Firefox
